tool_description: API design for Kasatintin News App
title: KasatintinApi

api_list.name: getapost
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://kasatintinapi.p.rapidapi.com//"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "kasatintinapi.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
